title: Avengers: Doomsday
text:

(Earth-TRN1401)|Gambit / Remy LeBeau]] * {{WP|Alan Cumming}} as [[Kurt Wagner|Nightcrawler / Kurt Wagner]] * {{WP|Rebecca Romjin}} as [[Raven Darkhölme|Mystique / Raven Darkhölme]] Additionally, {{WP|Chris Evans (actor)|Chris Evans}} was cast in an undisclosed role. | Notes = | Trivia = * Originally slated to be released on May 2, 2025, it has now been delayed to December 18, 2026.{{cite web|url=https://deadline.com/2025/05/next-avengers-movies-push-release-dates-dog-stars-devil-wears-prada-1236409088/|title=Disney Pushes Next Two ‘Avengers’ Movies; Dates ‘The Dog Stars’ & ‘The Devil Wears Prada 2’|work=Deadline Hollywood|last=Grobar|first=Matt|date=May 22, 2025|accessdate=May 22, 2025}} * The film was originally called ''Avengers: The Kang Dynasty'', and [[Kang the Conqueror (Earth-199999)|Kang the Conqueror]] was set to be the antagonist. The film was reworked and renamed due to Kang's actor, {{WP|Jonathan Majors}}, being fired due to domestic abuse allegations.{{Cite web|url=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/marvel-drops-jonathan-majors-as-kang-1235391129/|title=Marvel Drops Jonathan Majors After Assault, Harassment Verdict}}{{Cite web|url=https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/magazines/panache/marvels-kang-dynasty-officially-cancelled-as-russo-brothers-announce-avengers-doomsday-what-this-means-for-mcu/articleshow/112080566.cms?from=mdr|title=Marvel's 'Kang Dynasty' officially cancelled as Russo brothers announce 'Avengers: Doomsday'. What this means for MCU?}} ==Gallery== ====Logos==== Avengers The Kang Dynasty logo 001.jpg Avengers Doomsday logo 001.jpg Avengers Doomsday logo 002.jpg ====Promo==== Avengers Doomsday Cast Announcement.jpeg|Cast Announcement ==Videos== ====Other==== Avengers- Doomsday - Now in Production | Links = * [[Marvel Films#Upcoming Films|Marvel Films]] }} [[ru:Мстители 5]]
